jbt.execution.task.decorator
Class ExecutionDecorator

java.lang.Object
  jbt.execution.core.ExecutionTask
      jbt.execution.task.decorator.ExecutionDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaskListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExecutionHierarchicalContextManager, ExecutionInterrupter, ExecutionInverter, ExecutionLimit, ExecutionRepeat, ExecutionSafeContextManager, ExecutionSafeOutputContextManager, ExecutionSucceeder, ExecutionUntilFail
public abstract class ExecutionDecorator
extends ExecutionTask

Base class for all the ExecutionTask subclasses that are able to run decorator tasks (that is, classes that inherit from ModelDecorator).

Author:
Ricardo Juan Palma Dur√°n

Constructor Detail

ExecutionDecorator

public ExecutionDecorator(ModelTask modelTask,
                          BTExecutor executor,
                          ExecutionTask parent)
Creates an ExecutionDecorator that is able to run a particular ModelDecorator task.

Parameters:
modelTask - the ModelDecorator task to run.
executor - the BTExecutor that will manage this ExecutionDecorator.
parent - the parent ExecutionTask of this task.
